com.here.android.mpa.common

Class CountryInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.here.android.mpa.common.CountryInfo

  • public class CountryInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents information about the country such as code, metrics system, etc.

      • getCountryInfo

        public static void getCountryInfo(GeoCoordinate coordinate,
                                  CountryInfo.Listener listener,
                                  Request.Connectivity connectivity)
        Gets a CountryInfo for a given coordinate.

        Under the hood, this function uses the ReverseGeocodeRequest API to get the country by geo coordinates. That is why the function performs asynchronous call that may take a time. It requires internet connection or previously downloaded maps to work.

        Parameters:
        coordinate - A GeoCoordinate to get country information.
        listener - A Listener to get request result.
        connectivity - Desired Request.Connectivity for request.
